title: Guide to Boosting Your Instagram Business Page
headline: This free online course explains how to improve visibility and increase the reach of your Instagram business page.
description: Since the launch of Instagram a decade ago, plenty has changed in the networking field. Over a billion people across the world use Instagram. It is a perfect place for businesses to stand out from the competition by creating innovative visual content. At least 90% of Instagram users actively follow a business account. This course will teach you how to make people aware of your Instagram business page and advance its efficiency.

courseDescription:
In today's society, everyone on Instagram expects things to happen overnight. But no matter how many people promise that all you have to do is hit the ‘explore’ page and you'll be ‘Instagram famous’, the reality is that growth does not happen from a ‘lucky’ viral post. Instead, people want you to believe they know the ‘secret to success’ so they can sell you their knowledge and services. Anyone who has grown on Instagram (or any other platform) knows that it does not happen overnight.

You will not be able to increase your following by ‘playing the algorithm’. It takes patience, consistency and wise participation. Are you interested in focusing on developing your Instagram page? If you answered ‘yes’, you have come to the right place because this course will teach you exactly how to do this. We first introduce some fundamental tips for growing your Instagram accounts, such as consistent posting, Instagram ‘stories’, niche research, picture aspect ratio and ‘shoutouts’.

Next, we demonstrate how Link Tree helps you to automatically get multiple bio links and monetise your IGTV videos and target hashtags to gain exposure. Then discover how to mass upload drafts and share them on an Instagram ‘story’. Explore the most successful Instagram methods and strategies and how to get verified. Finally, we answer the most frequent Instagram marketing questions. Sign up for this course today if you are ready to enhance the competitiveness of your Instagram business page.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module will discover some of the most prominent and best Instagram marketing grow tips that you can utilize today to start growing your Instagram quickly. You will learn when to post, create an Instagram page worth following, and leverage IG stories, highlights and video content.
